subject: Glow and Shine invited you to Faire
preview: Glow and Shine is inviting you to join Faire         Join Faire, the online wholesale marketplace, to sell your line to over 400,000 retailers.         Start Selling on Faire

action.text: Rica Rosario Valencia marked as Closed

full_threads.body:
Glow and Shine is inviting you to join Faire
Join Faire, the online wholesale marketplace, to sell your line to over 400,000 retailers.
Start Selling on Faire
Glow and Shine is inviting you to join Faire
Join Faire, the online wholesale marketplace, to sell your line alongside Glow and Shine and over 60,000 brands.
Start Selling on Faire
Faire is the largest online marketplace for wholesale
The 400,000+ independent retailers shopping on Faire represent more locations in North America than Starbucks, Walgreens, Walmart, Sephora, Target, and Nordstrom-combined.
Faire is the largest online marketplace for wholesale
The 400,000+ independent retailers shopping on Faire represent more locations in North America than Starbucks, Walgreens, Walmart, Sephora, Target, and Nordstrom-combined.
